plot outline: The movie revolves around a village in northern Kerala where political murders happen and in such one incident a guy is murdered mistaking him to be someone else. The families of both are left stranded and the film takes us through the incidents that happen to the children of both families.
title: Aakashathinum Bhoomikkumidayil
plot: A village in northern Kerala where political murders are common. In one such incident, a guy who is mistaken to be someone else is murdered. This unfortunate incident leaves two families stranded.

The movie revolves around a village in northern Kerala where political murders happen and in such one incident a guy is murdered mistaking him to be someone else. The families of both are left stranded and the film takes us through the incidents that happen to the children of both families.::Screenplay by: Peethambaran
